de la soul: greed got you thinkin youre speedin up when you really slowing down got your eyes bigger than anything your arms could ever fit around and still you want more...always more... satisfaction guaranteed but never comes bend you backwards into believing its your birthright to own the world excessive too many cars in the garage bling on every finger possessions pulling at you poisoned by that money mentality your vision aint clear for them designer shades cant even see the sky only empty space to buy the pursuit of paper got you running so fast after that green drowning in things tangled in your own tenacity desire for that dollar...
